text:
Key Takeaways Plan a memorable bachelorette party with customized decorations and funny quotes like "Kiss the miss goodbye."

Excite your friends using cute phrases like "Team bride" to make everyone feel special and included.

For a fun twist, incorporate drinking-themed captions such as "Pour decisions" to add humor to your event.

The perfect bachelorette party involves a ton of planning and preparation to get all your closest friends together to celebrate the end of your single years. But once a schedule has been locked in and all Venmo requests have been sent, you and your crew are bound to have the ultimate getaway no one will soon forget.

The best part about these pre-wedding trips? They provide individuals with the opportunity to go crazy with décor, accessories, and party favors. Seriously, it’s impossible to overdo it: Banners, koozies, shot glasses, and pool floaties are all part of the fun. However, for a truly memorable bachelorette, take it one step further and customize all these goodies with fun bachelorette party quotes, captions, and phrases to commemorate your last weekend of singledom.

To help inspire you as you plan this epic weekend, we’ve rounded up the best bachelorette party captions, quotes, and phrases for your upcoming trip. You can use them as social media captions, on shirts and swag, or as a weekend anthem as you’re cheers-ing with your besties to your future union.

Getty Images / Brides

Classic Bachelorette Party Captions, Quotes, and Phrases for Brides

"Kiss the miss goodbye"

"Last fling before the ring"

"Bach and boujee"

"Look on the bride side"

"Single for the very last time"

"Engaged AF"

"Bride-in-training"

"Bride vibes on repeat"

"Wife of the party"

"Blessed with the best friends"

"To love, laughter, and happily ever after"

"Feyoncé"

"I have the best 'I do' crew around"

Getty Images / Brides

Classic Bachelorette Party Captions, Quotes, and Phrases for Guests

"A final toast to the single life before [name] becomes a wife"

"She said 'yes,' we said [location]"

"Love you a brunch"

"Celebrating her forever"

"Bachelorette support crew"

"The real bridesmaids of [location]"

"Team bride"

“'I do' crew"

"Bridal brunch bunch"

"Bride tribe"

"Good times and tan lines with the bride"

"#BrideSquad"

"She said YAAAAS"



Getty Images / Brides

Funny Bachelorette Party Captions, Quotes, and Phrases

"She said okurrr"

"100% that bach"

"Caution: [Bride name] may contain alcohol"

"[I'm/she's] not a regular bride, [I'm/she's] a cool bride"

"Always a bridesmaid, never a sober one"

"Get in loser, it’s [name’s] bachelorette"

"Look like a beauty, party like a beast"

"One more night, let’s do it right"

"‘Til death do us party"

"Bride or die"

"Out to play before we give her away"

"[Name’s] last ride before she’s the bride"

"Miss behaving"

"Star of the show (and her extras)"



Getty Images / Brides

Cute Bachelorette Party Captions, Quotes, and Phrases

"From Miss to Mrs"

"The last sail before the veil"

"Girls just wanna have fun"

"My crew is better than yours"

"Trophy wife status"

"Cheers to a lifetime of love, happiness, and joy"

"Soon-to-be Mrs"

"A sweet ending to a new beginning"

"#ImGettingMarried"

"Boots & bling before the ring.”

"Sun, sand, and a ring on my hand"

"Who runs the world? Wives!"

"Forever and a day, I'll always remember today"



Getty Images / Brides

Drinking-Themed Bachelorette Party Captions, Quotes, and Phrases
